original_title: UFC Fight Night 86: Rothwell vs. Dos Santos
overview: UFC Fight Night 86: Rothwell vs. Dos Santos was a mixed martial arts event held on April 10, 2016, at the Arena Zagreb in Zagreb, Croatia. A heavyweight bout between Ben Rothwell and former UFC Heavyweight Champion Junior dos Santos served as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 86: Rothwell vs. Dos Santos
